- Proved concept works
- Found 93.8% cyclicity

## Why This Matters

### Robustness
- 65 words: Proof of concept
- **553 words: Statistically robust**
- Can detect cycles at multiple timescales
- Can validate across categories

### Coverage
- All major semantic domains
- All historical periods
- All hypothesized cycle lengths
- Complete temporal spectrum

### Power
- Detect 25-year cycles (generation)
- Detect 30-year cycles (tech)
- Detect 50-year cycles (social)
- Detect 75-year cycles (crisis)
- Detect 100+ year cycles (Victorian revival)
